title: A quick question
body:
Hmm I was wondering if its possible to change the voice of champions & announcer in-game using the LVOC app and it will be counted legal so I wont be banned,because I know that atm MKJogo/MKLol was flagged red and its impossible to use it and who is gets banned so just a quick question and if possible for a Rioter to comment I would be very happy.
Thanks !.

replies.body: We don't currently support any third party modifications or programs.  Doing this would be at your own risk, meaning we wouldn't be able to provide any support if you run into any issues with the game or client.  Also, one can never be sure what other content these unknown sources might contain.  Our stance on third parties can be found [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/5kx4F7VE-reminder-third-party-applications).  I hope that helps clear some things up!
